author: Dan Cain For Mailonline
title: Perrie Edwards vamps up in a racy black corset | Daily Mail Online
text: Share 70 shares The sassy shot comes after the singer posted a picture of herself putting on an amorous display with her footballer boyfriend Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain. The pair shared a romantic smooch in Paris, close to the base of the illuminated Eiffel Tower. New man: The sassy shot comes after the singer posted a picture of herself putting on an amorous display with her footballer boyfriend Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain Reports surfaced in November that the pair had hooked up, with various sources revealing the couple were growing closer, after Alex was spotted at The X Factor finale to watch Little Mix perform, while she attended an Arsenal match. Back in December a source told The Mirror: 'Perrie has bought her family and friends Arsenal merchandise for Christmas – it shows how much she thinks of him. 'Things are hotting up between the pair – they love spending time with each other and make each other laugh a lot.' If you got it... Perrie's not afraid to show off her stunning figure on social media Despite reports of their love, the flame appeared to extinguish last month when the couple seemed to be embroiled in a row outside the appropriately named Drama nightclub. Heading out on to the street at around 3.30am, Perrie looked serious as she exhanged words with her footballer beau, 23, who was then seen making a phone call as he lingered in the doorway. Little Mix are currently stateside supporting American pop star Ariana Grande on tour. Bikini babe: The beauty often treats her fans to racy snapshots
